violations.message: FAIL: Line 32: Subprocess Partial Path (S603/S607) - subprocess.run(["git", *args]) uses partial path instead of shutil.which("git"); Line 32: Direct Subprocess Calls - subprocess.run() outside /base workers, should use GitCommandWorker; Line 44: Subprocess Exit Ignored - git_run called without check=True parameter; Line 59: Exception → None - get_repo_root returns None on exception without explicit | None in docstring stating "Returns None if not found"
